m_szDocTitle: Tesla Motors Inc Should Watch Germany, Not Detroit for Competition -- The Motley Fool
m_szDocSumamry: Login Tesla Motors Inc Should Watch Germany, Not Detroit for Competition Tesla currently dominates the electric vehicle market but BMW is making a push into EVs and has the performance and backing to be a major competitor. Travis Hoium ( TMFFlushDraw ) Mar 30, 2014 at 6:37PM Detroit can't seem to get electric vehicles right. The Chevy Volt by General Motors ( NYSE:GM ) is only half electric and isn't inspirational for the high-end market that can go electric. The Nissan Leaf would leave even the shortest commuter with range anxiety. And the Ford ( NYSE:F ) Focus Electric doesn't quite provide
